settings.heading: Timeless Oak Craftsmanship – Built for Homes, Designed to Last
settings.para_text: At Classic Oak, we believe that the beauty of natural wood lies in its strength, character, and timeless appeal. With decades of experience in timber craftsmanship, we take pride in offering premium-quality oak products that transform homes and projects across the UK. Whether you’re looking for elegant skirting boards, durable flooring, or precision-cut joinery, our expert team ensures every piece meets the highest standards of quality and sustainability.

settings.heading: Who We Are
settings.description: Classic Oak is a specialist supplier of premium oak skirting boards, architraves, flooring, and bespoke joinery. With years of experience in the timber industry, we pride ourselves on offering high-quality, sustainably sourced wood products that bring warmth, durability, and style to any space.

settings.heading: Sustainably Sourced, Built to Last
settings.description:
We are committed to responsible forestry practices, ensuring that every piece of oak we supply comes from 
sustainably managed sources. Our goal is to provide eco-friendly wood products that enhance homes while 
preserving our forests for future generations.

settings.heading: Family-Owned Craftsmanship
settings.description: As a family-run business, Classic Oak has been dedicated to quality woodworking for generations. We take pride in personally overseeing every step of the process—from selecting the finest oak to precision-milling and finishing each piece to perfection. With our hands-on approach and deep-rooted passion for timber, we ensure that every product meets the highest standards.

settings.heading: Manufacturing Process – From Raw Timber to Precision Finish
settings.para_text:
Our commitment to quality starts with responsibly sourced hardwoods and follows a meticulous manufacturing process to ensure
precision-milled, high-quality timber products.

settings.heading: Step 1: Sustainable Sourcing
settings.content:
We source top-quality, sustainable hardwoods from reputable sawmills across North America and Europe. Our suppliers adhere to responsible forest management practices and rotational harvesting techniques to ensure sustainability. Whenever possible, we prioritize purchasing certified raw 
materials.

settings.heading: Step 2: Precision Cutting & Calibration
settings.content: At our facility, sawn oak boards are precisely cut to size and calibrated using advanced wood moulding machinery. This technology enables our skilled machinists to assess each board's unique characteristics and select the optimal face for crafting custom profiles and mouldings. By combining state-of-the-art equipment with expert craftsmanship, we ensure that every piece meets our high standards of quality and aesthetic appeal.

settings.heading: Step 3: Trimming, Knot Filling & Sanding
settings.content:
After the boards have been machined to the desired size and profile, they 
undergo double end trimming to remove any end splits or defects. Any knots present in the wood are carefully filled with a colour-matching wood filler. The boards are then machine-sanded to a smooth 100-grit finish, ensuring they are ready for oiling or staining before installation

settings.heading: Step 4: Careful Selection & Dispatch
settings.content: Once we receive your order, the boards will be carefully selected, packaged, and promptly dispatched.
